fields_of_interest: Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence
eu_initiatives: Legal help for Organization for Security and Co-operation in Europe
membership: International Human Rights Defence Committee (UN) - Associated Member
goals__remit:
Practicing lawyer for more than 10 years. 
Motto in work and life: «Actions speak for themselves» (Latin version «Acta probant se ipsa»). 
Member of Kyiv Region Bar Association since 2010. 
The main areas of professional competence: 
Tax law and the legal regulation of economic activity 
Corporate and Commercial Law 
Criminal Law (Economic crimes) 
Legal protection of intellectual property 
Human Rights 
European Law
